author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
#### PR description:

Development of HLT menus for `CMSSW_12_3_X`. Includes the integration of the following JIRA tickets:

 - [CMSHLT-2205](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2205): [MUO] GEMs in L2-muon producers
 - [CMSHLT-2209](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2209): [TAU] new TAU paths for Run-3 startup
 - [CMSHLT-2213](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2213): [BPH] removal of `HLTIterativeTrackingIteration1` sequence from BPH paths
 - [CMSHLT-2216](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2216): [BTV] update of `BTagMu` paths

#### PR validation:

TSG tests.

#### If this PR is a backport, please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: HLT development for `12_3_X`
